name: complexly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves a lot of different but related parts: The two stories were complexly interwoven. The different aspects of the situation are complexly entangled.
in a way that is difficult to understand or find an answer to because of having many different parts: It was a complexly worded question that required a lot of thought and effort to answer. He is a notoriously difficult author who generally prefers to state things as complexly as possible.
More examplesFewer examplesThe film is superbly and complexly plotted.India is a vast and complexly diverse country.The book describes language as a complexly ill-defined code.
